import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { create } from '../../services/plantsService' import { Col, Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; const PlantView = ({ plantsData, setPlantsData, toggleGardenView, setToggleGardenView }) => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [scientificName, setScientificName] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') //const [plantingMonth, setPlantingMonth] = useState('') //const [monthToHarvest, setMonthToHaverst] = useState('') const [sunlight, setSunlight] = useState('Shade') const [soilType, setSoilType] = useState('Clay') const [watering, setWatering] = useState('Twice a day') //const [growingZone, setGrowingZone] = useState('') const [idealTemp, setIdealTemp] = useState("Not Defined") const [seedDepth, setSeedDepth] = useState('') //const [spacing, setSpacing] = useState(0) //const [daysToMature, setDaysToMature] = useState(0) //const [sproutsIn, setSproutsIn] = useState(0) const [imageURL, setImageURL] = useState('') const [grownFromSeed, setGrownFromSeed] = useState('Yes') const [heirloom, setHeirloom] = useState('Yes') const handleAddPlant = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newPlant = { name, scientificName, description, grownFromSeed, // plantingMonth, // monthToHarvest, sunlight, soilType, watering, imageURL, heirloom, //growingZone, idealTemp, seedDepth, //spacing, //daysToMature, //sproutsIn } create(newPlant) .then((returnedPlant) => { setPlantsData(plantsData.concat(returnedPlant)) }) .catch(err => console.log('There was an error submitting a plant', err)) setToggleGardenView(!toggleGardenView) } return (
setName(e.target.value)} id="plantName" placeholder="Enter plant name" /> setScientificName(e.target.value)} id="scientificName" placeholder="Enter scientific name" /> setDescription(e.target.value)} id="description" placeholder="Write a brief description" /> setImageURL(e.target.value)} id="imageURL" placeholder="Enter a URL" />

Enter a complete URL linking to your plant's image. We suggest using Google Photos

 setSoilType(e.target.value)} type="select" name="soil" id="soil"> setWatering(e.target.value)} type="select" name="watering" id="watering"> {/* setPlantingMonth(e.target.value)} id="plantingMonth" /> setMonthToHaverst(e.target.value)} id="harvest" /> */} setSunlight(e.target.value)} id="sunlight"> setGrownFromSeed(e.target.value)} id="seed"> setSeedDepth(e.target.value)} id="seedDepth" placeholder="Enter depth in inches" /> setIdealTemp(e.target.value)} id="idealTemp" placeholder="Temperature in Fahrenheit" /> setHeirloom(e.target.value)} id="seed">
) } export default PlantView
